abstract: Manchester City soccer club says forward Carlos Tevez will face disciplinary hearing over alleged breach of contract after apparently refusing to come off the bench during Champions League match; other soccer items noted.
snippet: Manchester City says Carlos Tévez will face a disciplinary hearing over alleged breach of contract after apparently refusing to come off the bench during a Champions League match.
lead_paragraph: Manchester City says Carlos Tévez will face a disciplinary hearing over alleged breach of contract after apparently refusing to come off the bench during a Champions League match.
